chapter: Inverse Trigonometric Functions and Their Graphs

definitions.definition_eng: Gives angle whose sine is x.
Gives angle whose cosine is x.
Gives angle whose tangent is x.
Chosen range that defines inverse trig uniquely.

definitions.definition_math: Reflection of original function across line y=x
definitions.definition_eng: Inverse trig graph is the mirrored form of its corresponding trig graph.
